title: Nijigaku: Towards the Shuffle Festival! Part 3
detail_text: <:th_ch0202/>Shizuko~, let me interview you!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Interview....? What’s going on, Kasumi-san?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>We’re doing a relay-style interview of everyone for the upcoming Shuffle Festival. Ayumu-senpai passed the baton to me. So, Shizuko. How do you feel about the Shuffle Festival?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>To dive into a completely different world from my own is really fun!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Ooh, you seem really into it, aren’t you?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Fufu. I love to act and express myself, so to see and feel things that I don’t normally experience is both fresh and enjoyable.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>So basically, we can expect to see a different person than the usual proper Shizuko on the live, right!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>What do you mean proper? Are you saying I’m like that?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Don’t you act like a good girl in front of senpai, Shizuko~. Even though you’re always so harsh on me.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>I-, it’s not like I was trying to act like a good girl! Besides, I’m always kind to you too, Kasumi-san! Here, pet pet!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
